scripts.apk: npm run build && npm run sync-android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.ipa: npm run build && npm run sync-ios && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Debug -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath App.xcarchive archive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath App.xcarchive -exportPath . -exportOptionsPlist exportOptions.plist
scripts.ios-dev: npm run build && npm run sync-ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios-sim: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios-device: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios --target 00008030-000368D80179802E
